name: AlarmSeveritiesToTitlePipe
description:
Pipe for transforming an array of alarm severity types into a comma-separated string.

Example :
Usage in a template: {{ ['WARNING', 'CRITICAL'] | AlarmSeveritiesToTitle }}
Result: 'Warning, Critical'
rawdescription:
Pipe for transforming an array of alarm severity types into a comma-separated string.

```html
Usage in a template: {{ ['WARNING', 'CRITICAL'] | AlarmSeveritiesToTitle }}
Result: 'Warning, Critical'
```

methods.name: transform
methods.rawdescription: Transforms an array of alarm severity types into a comma-separated string.
methods.description: Transforms an array of alarm severity types into a comma-separated string.
